Verses: 1 medhiyanaagiya Thariyu Arasaanda Mudhalaam Varushaththile Naan Avanaith Thidappaduththavum Balappaduththavum Avanukkuth Thunai Nindren.

2 ippodhu Naan Meyyaana Seydhiyai Unakku Arivippen; Idho, Innum Moondru Raajaakkal Persiyaavil Ezhumbuvaargal; Adhinpinbu Naalaam Raajaavaayiruppavan Ellaarilum Magaa Aisuvariya Sambannanaagi, Than Aisuvariyaththinaal Balankondu, Grekku Raajyaththukku Virodhamaaga Sagalaraiyum Ezhuppividuvaan.
3 aanaalum Paraakkiramamulla Oru Raajaa Ezhumbi, Prabalamaai Aandu, Thanakku Ishtamaanapadi Seyvaan.

4 avan Ezhumbinapinbu, Avanudaiya Raajyam Udaindhupoi, Vaanaththin Naalu Thisaigalilum Pagukkappadum; Aanaalum Adhu Avanudaiya Sandhadhiyaarukku Alla, Avan Seydha Aalugaiyinpadiyum Alla; Avanudaiya Raajyam Pidungappattu, Avanudaiyavargalallaadha Verepergalidamaaith Thaandippom.
5 thendrisai Raajaa Balavaanaayiruppaan; Aanaalum Avanudaiya Prabukkalil Oruvan Avanaippaarkkilum Balavaanaagi Aaluvaan; Ivanudaiya Aalugai Balaththa Aalugaiyaayirukkum.

6 avargal Sila Varushangalukkuppinbu, Oruvarodoruvar Sambandhampannumpadikkuth Thendrisai Raajaavin Kumaaraththi Vadathisai Raajaavinidaththil Varuvaal; Aanaalum Avalukku Puyabalam Iraamarpom; Avanum Avanudaiya Buyamum Nilainirpadhillai; Avalum Avalai Azhaiththuvandhavargalum, Avalaip Petravanum, Avalai Akkaalangalil Balappaduththinavanum Oppukkodukkappaduvaargal.
7 aanaalum Avaludaiya Vergalin Kilaiyaagiya Oruvan Than Sthaanaththil Ezhumbi, Raanuvaththode Vandhu Vadathisai Raajaavin Aranippukkul Pravesiththu, Avargalai Virodhiththu,

8 avargaludaiya Adhipadhigalaiyum Avargaludaiya Vilaiyerappetra Velliyum Ponnumaagiya Paaththirangalaiyum, Avargaludaiya Dheyvangalaiyunkooda Egipthukkuk Kondupoi, Sila Varushangalmattum Vadathisairaajaavaippaarkkilum Nilaiyaai Nirpaan.
9 thendrisai Raajaa Avan Raajyaththukku Virodhamaaga Vandhu, Than Dhesaththukkuth Thirumbipponaan.

10 aanaalum Avanudaiya Kumaarar Yuththancheyya Eththaniththu, Thiralaana Senaigalaik Koottuvaargal; Ivargalil Oruvan Nichchayamaai Vandhu Vellampolak Kadandhu, Thirumbavum Thannudaiya Aranmattum Yuththankalandhu Seruvaan.

11 appozhudhu Thendrisai Raajaa Kadunkobankondu Purappattuppoi, Vadathisai Raajaavode Yuththampannuvaan; Ivan Periya Senaiyai Egamaai Niruththuvaan; Aanaalum Indha Senai Avan Kaiyil Oppukkodukkappadum.
12 avan Indha Senaiyai Neekkinapinbu, Avanudaiya Irudhayam Garvankollum; Avan Anegamaayiramperai Madivippaan; Aanaalum Balankollamaattaan.
13 sila Varushangal Sendrapinbu Vadathisai Raajaa Thirumba Mundhinasenaiyilum Peridhaana Senaiyai Serththu, Magaa Periya Senaiyodum Vegu Sambaththodum Nichchayamaai Varuvaan.
14 akkaalangalil Thendrisai Raajaavukku Virodhamaaga Anegar Ezhumbuvaargal; Appozhudhu Un Janaththilulla Thundarikkakkaararin Puththirar Dharisanaththai Niraivetrath Thangalai Uyarththuvaargal.
15 vadathisai Raajaa Vandhu, Koththalam Pottu, Aranaana Nagarangalaip Pidippaan; Thendrisai Raajaavin Puyabalangalum Avan Therindhukonda Janamum Nillaamarpom; Edhirkkiradharku Belan Iraadhu.
16 aagaiyaal Avanukku Virodhamaaga Varugiravan Than Ishtappadi Seyvaan; Avanukku Munbaaga Nilainirpavan Oruvanum Illai; Avan Singaaramaana Dhesaththil Thanguvaan; Ellaam Avan Kaivasamaagum.

17 than Raajyaththin Vallamaiyodellaam Thaanum Thannodekooda Semmaimaarkkaththaarum Vara, Ivanthan Mugaththaith Thiruppuvaan; Ippadi Seydhu Kedudhiyundaagumpadi Avanukku Oru Kannippennaik Koduppaan, Aanaalum Avalaale Sthiramperaan; Aval Avan Patchaththil Nillaal.

18 pinbu Ivan Than Mugaththaith Theevugalukku Neraagath Thiruppi, Anegan Theevugalaip Pidippaan; Aanaalum Oru Senaapadhi Ivan Seygira Nindhaiyai Ozhiyappannuvadhumallaal, Ivan Seydha Nindhaiyinimiththam Ivanukku Sarikku Sarikkattuvaan.
19 aagaiyaal Than Mugaththaith Than Dhesaththin Arangalukku Neraagath Thiruppuvaan; Ange Idarivizhundhu Kaanappadaamarpovaan.
20 sezhippaana Raajyaththil Thandalkaaranaith Thiriyappannugira Oruvan Than Sthaanaththil Ezhumbuvaan; Aagilum Silanaalaikkul Kobamillaamalum Yuththamillaamalum Naasamadaivaan.

21 avan Sthaanaththil Avamadhikkappattavan Oruvan Ezhumbuvaan; Ivanukku Raajyabaaraththin Menmaiyaik Kodaadhiruppaargal; Aanaalum Ivan Samaadhaanamaai Nuzhaindhu, Ichchagam Pesi, Raajyaththaik Kattikkolvaan.
22 pravaagamaai Varugira Senaigal Ivanaale Pravaagamaai Murikkappadum; Udanpadikkaiyin Thalaivanum Murikkappaduvaan.
23 enendraal Avanode Sambandhampannina Naatkalmudhal Avan Soodhaai Nadandhu, Konjam Janangalode Purappattuvandhu Belankolluvaan.

24 dhesam Sugavaazhvodum Sampooranaththodum Irukkaiyil, Avan Utpravesiththu, Than Pidhaakkalum Than Pidhaakkalin Pidhaakkalum Seyyaadhadhai Seyvaan, Kollaiyittuchchooraiyaadi, Porulai Avargalukku Iraiththup Pangittu, Arangalukku Virodhamaagath Thanakkul Ubaayangalai Yosippaan; Silakaalamattum Ippadiyirukkum.

25 pinnum Thendrisai Raajaavukku Virodhamaagap Periya Senaiyode Porseyyath Than Vallamaiyaiyum Than Sthiraththaiyum Ezhuppuvaan, Appozhudhu Thendrisai Raajaa Migavum Balaththa Periya Raanuvaththode Poi Yuththankalappaan; Aanaalum Avargal Avanukku Virodhamaaga Dhuraalosanai Panniyirundhapadiyaal, Avan Nirkamaattaan.
26 avanudaiya Pojanangalai Saappidugiravargal Avanai Naasappaduththuvaargal; Aagaiyaal Avanudaiya Raanuvam Pravaagamaai Varum; Anegar Kolaiyundu Vizhuvaargal.
27 indha Irandu Raajaakkalin Irudhayamum Theemai Seyya Ninaikkum; Ore Pandhiyilirundhu Poi Pesuvaargal, Aanaalum Adhu Vaaippadhillai; Kuriththakaalaththukku Mudivu Innum Niruththivaikkappattirukkum.
28 avan Magaa Sambaththode Than Dhesaththukkuth Thirumbi, Than Irudhayaththaip Parisuththa Udanpadikkaikku Virodhamaaga Vaiththu, Adharkaanadhai Seydhu, Than Dhesaththukkuth Thirumbip Povaan.
29 kuriththakaalaththile Thirumbavum Thendhesaththirku Varuvaan; Aanaalum Avanudaiya Pinnadapadi Munnadapadiyaippol Iraadhu.

30 avanukku Virodhamaagak Kiththeemin Kappalgal Varum; Adhinaal Avan Mananovadaindhu, Thirumbippoi Parisuththa Udanpadikkaikku Virodhaamaagak Krodhankondu, Adharkaanadhai Seydhu, Parisuththa Udanpadikkaiyaith Thallinavargalai Anusarippaan.
31 aanaalum Avanidaththilirundhu Purappattasenaigal Ezhumbi, Aranaana Parisuththa Sthalaththaip Parisuththakkulaichchalaakki, Andraadapaliyai Neekki, Paazhaakkum Aruvaruppai Ange Vaippaargal.
32 udanpadikkaikkuth Dhrogigalaayirukkiravargalai Ichchadappechchugalinaal Kallamaarkkaththaaraakkuvaan; Thangal Dhevanai Arindhirukkira Janangal Thidankondu, Adharketrapadi Seyvaargal.
33 janangalil Arivaaligal Anegarukku Arivai Unarththuvaargal; Aneganaalmattum Pattayaththinaalum Akkiniyinaalum Siraiyiruppinaalum Kollaiyinaalum Vizhuvaargal.
34 ippadi Avargal Vizhugaiyil Konjam Oththaasaiyaal Sagaayamadaivaargal; Appozhudhu Anegar Ichchaga Vaarththaigalode Avargalai Ottikkolvaargal.
35 arivaaligalaip Pudamidugiradharkum, Suththigarikkiradharkum, Venmaiyaakkugiradharkum Avargalil Silar Vizhuvaargal; Mudivukaalapariyandham Ippadiyirukkum; Kuriththakaalam Vara Innum Naal Sellum.

36 raajaa Thanakku Ishtamaanapadi Seydhu, Thannai Uyarththi, Endha Dhevanilum Thannaip Periyavanaakki, Dhevaadhi Dhevanukku Virodhamaaga Aachchariyamaana Kaariyangalaip Pesuvaan; Kobam Theerumattum Avanukkuk Kaikoodivarum; Nirnayikkappattadhu Nadandherum.
37 avan Than Pidhaakkalin Dhevargalai Madhiyaamalum, Sthreegalin Snegaththaiyum, Endha Dhevanaiyum Madhiyaamalum, Ellaavatrirkum Thannaip Periyavanaakki,
38 arangalin Dhevanaith Than Sthaanaththile Ganampanni Than Pidhaakkal Ariyaadha Oru Dhevanaip Ponninaalum, Velliyinaalum, Raththinangalinaalum, Uchchidhamaana Vasthukkalinaalum Ganampannuvaan.

39 avan Aranippaana Kottaigalukkaagavum, Anniya Dhevanukkaagavum Seyvadhu Ennavendraal, Avaigalai Madhikkiravargalukku Magaa Ganamundaakki, Avargal Anegarai Aalumpadi Seydhu, Avargalukku Dhesaththaik Kirayaththukkaagap Pangiduvaan.

40 mudivukaalaththilovendraal, Thendrisai Raajaa Avanode Muttukku Nirpaan; Vadathisai Raajaavum Radhangalodum Kudhiraiveerargalodum Anegam Kappalgalodum Sooraikkaatrupol Avanukku Virodhamaai Varuvaan; Avan Dhesangalukkul Pravesiththu, Avaigalaip Pravaagiththuk Kadandhupovaan.
41 avan Singaaramaana Dhesaththilum Varuvaan; Appozhudhu Anega Dhesangal Kavizhkkappadum; Aanaalum Edhomum, Movaabum, Ammon Puththiraril Pradhaanamaanavargalum, Avan Kaikkuth Thappippovaargal.
42 avan Dhesangalinmel Than Kaiyai Neettuvaan; Egipthudhesam Thappuvadhillai.
43 egipthinudaiya Ponnum Velliyumaana Aisuvariyangalaiyum Uchchidhamaana Ellaa Vasthukkalaiyum Aandukolluvaan; Leebiyarum Eththiyoppiyarum Avanukkup Pinselluvaargal.
44 aanaalum Kizhakkilum Vadakkilum Irundhu Varum Seydhigal Avanaik Kalangappannum; Appozhudhu Avan Anegarai Azhikkavum Sangaarampannavum Magaa Ukkiraththode Purappattuppoi,
45 samuththirangalukku Idaiyilulla Singaaramaana Parisuththa Parvadhaththandaiyile Than Aramanaiyaagiya Koodaarangalaip Poduvaan; Aanaalum Avanukku Oththaasai Pannuvaarillaamal, Avan Mudivadaivaan.
